dcterms:creator: M. Saeidi
G. Bouchard
M. Liakata
S. Riedel
dcterms:description: The SentiHood dataset is designed for targeted aspect-based sentiment analysis, focusing on urban neighborhoods. It consists of 5,215 sentences, with various targets and aspects, allowing for the prediction of sentiment labels for each target-aspect pair.
dcterms:title: SentiHood

dcterms:creator: M. Pontiki
D. Galanis
H. Papageorgiou
I. Androutsopoulos
S. Manandhar
M. Al-Smadi
M. Al-Ayyoub
Y. Zhao
B. Qin
O. De Clercq
dcterms:description: The SemEval-2014 Task 4 dataset is used for aspect-based sentiment analysis, containing 3,044 sentences from restaurant reviews. The task involves predicting sentiment labels for each aspect mentioned in the sentences.
dcterms:title: SemEval-2014 Task 4
